meanings.definition: Having a supply of goods or materials available for sale or use.
meanings.sent1: The store was stocked with fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The pantry was stocked with cans of soup and boxes of pasta.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was stocked with so much food, it looked like a mini grocery store!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was stocked with memories of their adventures together.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was stocked with glittering jewels and gold coins.

meanings.definition: Filled with a supply of something.
meanings.sent1: The lake was stocked with fish for the fishing tournament.
meanings.sent2: The library was stocked with books on various subjects.
meanings.sent3: The toy box was stocked with so many toys, it was overflowing!
meanings.sent4: His heart was stocked with love for his family.
meanings.sent5: The garden was stocked with colorful flowers that brightened up the yard.

meanings.definition: Provided with a stock of something.
meanings.sent1: The camper was stocked with all the necessary supplies for the trip.
meanings.sent2: The toolbox was stocked with different types of tools for various tasks.
meanings.sent3: The fridge was stocked with so much food, it was hard to close the door!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was stocked with ideas for her next project.
meanings.sent5: The warehouse was stocked with boxes of merchandise waiting to be shipped.
